issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add CMake support for compiling LLVM's IR into a library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7820](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7820). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should be able to inject LLVM IR into libraries, assuming that `llc` is found on the platform.
